english_translation: If one lives for oneself, that life is not life;

kannada_original: ಪರ ಅಶ್ರು ಒರಸುವುದೆ ನಿಜ ಬಾಳ ಗುರಿಯೊ !
english_transliteration: para aśru orasuvude nija bāḷa guriyo!
english_translation: Is wiping the tears of others the true goal of life!
Harming others is sin, doing good to others is merit;

kannada_original: ಮರ ನಿನ್ನ, ನೆನೆ ಪರರ ! – ಮುದ್ದು ರಾಮ. 597
english_transliteration: mara ninna, nene parara! – Muddu Rāma. 597
english_translation: Forget yourself, remember others! – Muddu Rāma. 597
